scripts.clean:all: find * -maxdepth 0 ! -name package.json -not -name scripts -not -name saves -print0 | xargs -0 rm -rf --
scripts.clean:src: npm run clean:js && npm run clean:js.map && npm run clean:json && rm -f src/main.aot.ts
scripts.cp:aot: cp aot_files/index.html aot_files/favicon.ico public/ && cp aot_files/main.aot.ts src/
scripts.make:new: npm run clean:all && npm run copy:new
scripts.make: npm run clean:all && npm run copy:new && npm run clean
scripts.save:aa: [[ -d public ]] && [[ -d ./saves/aa ]] && rm ./saves/aa -rf && sleep 5; mv public saves/aa || echo 'compile first!!!'
scripts.save:hu: [[ -d public ]] && [[ -d ./saves/aa ]] && rm ./saves/hu -rf && sleep 5; mv public saves/hu || echo 'compile first!!!'
scripts.build:aa: npm run clean && ./scripts/create.sh all aa && npm run cp:aot && ngc -p tsconfig-prod-aot.json
scripts.build:hu: npm run clean && ./scripts/create.sh all hu && npm run cp:aot && ngc -p tsconfig-prod-aot.json
scripts.prod:aa: npm run build:aa && npm run build:css && webpack --config webpack/aot.config.js
scripts.prod:hu: npm run build:hu && npm run build:css && webpack --config webpack/aot.config.js
scripts.compile:aa: npm run clean:src && [[ ! -d public ]] && mkdir public; npm run prod:aa && npm run cp:htpacc:aa
scripts.compile:hu: npm run clean:src && [[ ! -d public ]] && mkdir public; npm run prod:hu && npm run cp:htpacc:hu
